content: one stitch tksw triplet knit shadow wrap work as ksw it will look like 3 sts triplet are made from the same stitch tpsw triplet purl shadow wrap work as psw to form triplet sts here is a link for a good tutorial on shadow wrap short row https //socktopusunplugged wordpress com/2011/02/05/short-row-shadow-wraps/ ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 4
